member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.ISymUnmanagedWriter5.MapTokenToSourceSpan(System.UInt32,Microsoft.Cci.ISymUnmanagedDocumentWriter,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Maps the given metadata token to the given source line span in the specified source file. Must be called between calls to OpenMapTokensToSourceSpans() and CloseMapTokensToSourceSpans().

member.name: F:Microsoft.Cci.PdbWriter.currentDocument
member.summary: Null is the sentinel value because the document of a FeeFee source context is the dummy document which must not be confused with the sentinel value. It stays null until the first non-FeeFee source context is encountered. It is updated only when another context is encountered that has a different document *and* is not a FeeFee source context itself.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.PdbWriter.DefineSequencePointsForCurrentDocument
member.summary: Flushes accumulated sequence points and re-initializes sequence point state.
